comments:
Build F2

1. Open properties of a Java project
2. Enter the following as Javadoc location:
http://www.cs.ucl.ac.uk/teaching/java/jdk1.3/docs/api/index.html
3. Press validate
4. Press Ok in the dialog

Check the .log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.ui 4 1 Jun 04, 2002 15:38:20.390
!MESSAGE Internal Error
!STACK 0
java.io.FileNotFoundException:
http://www.cs.ucl.ac.uk/teaching/java/jdk1.3/docs/api/index.html/index.html
	at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.preferences.JavadocConfigurationBlock$EntryValidator.validateURL(JavadocConfigurationBlock.java:202)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.preferences.JavadocConfigurationBlock$EntryValidator.run(JavadocConfigurationBlock.java:166)
	at org.eclipse.swt.custom.BusyIndicator.showWhile(BusyIndicator.java:64)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 19035 ***
